workday:human-resources.doc:name: Get Workers from Workday Human Resource

ee:transform.doc:name: Transform Workday employees to map of values for deactivation in Salesforce

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- if (vars.response.Get_Workers_Response.Response_Data != null) (vars.response.Get_Workers_Response.Response_Data.*Worker map (worker) -> { Email: if (worker.Worker_Data.Personal_Data.Contact_Data.Email_Address_Data != null) worker.Worker_Data.Personal_Data.Contact_Data.Email_Address_Data.Email_Address else null, Terminated: worker.Worker_Data.Employment_Data.Worker_Status_Data.Terminated }) distinctBy $ else []
